channel.title: Prayer On & Off sprites
channel.description:
I replaced my first four prayer sprites with curse prayers. I coded the prayers perfectly server sided, except for one thing. I think this is client sided, so I posted this here.
How can I change the prayer level requirement for the 'prayer on' sprites to appear in place of the 'prayer off' sprites?
Like at the moment, Soul Split takes the place of the "Burst of Strength" prayer, which shows the 'prayer on' sprite when you reach level 4 prayer. How can I change that number?

item.title: Prayer On & Off sprites
item.dc:creator: @revengr revengr
item.description:
@revengr wrote:

I replaced my first four prayer sprites with curse prayers.
I coded the prayers perfectly server sided, except for one thing.
I think this is client sided, so I posted this here.

How can I change the prayer level requirement for the ‘prayer on’ sprites to appear in place of the ‘prayer off’ sprites?

Like at the moment, Soul Split takes the place of the “Burst of Strength” prayer, which shows the ‘prayer on’ sprite when you reach level 4 prayer.
How can I change that number?
